quoteText:
Parties' rights and obligations, imposed by the present Agreement, as well as all juridical effects produced by the Agreement shall be interpreted and governed by the Romanian laws effective at that time.
Any dispute concerning this Agreement shall be solved by competent Romanian Courts of Law.
title: Softpedia choice of law is Romania

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: Softpedia choice of law is Romania
